code: import"./ForgotPassword.scss";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{forgotPassWord}from"../../services/UserService";import{Routers}from"../../utils/Constants";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ForgotPassword(_ref){let{}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{},[]);const handleCancel=()=>{navigate(-1);};const handleSendTokenToEmail=async()=>{await forgotPassWord(email).then(data=>{navigate(Routers.VerifyForgotPass,{state:{email:email}});}).catch(error=>{setError(error.message);return;});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"verify_account_page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"verify_account",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"verify_account--header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title",children:"Qu\xEAn m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"verify_account--body",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"input_token",value:email,onChange:e=>{setEmail(e.target.value);},placeholder:"Email"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notification",children:error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message_error",children:error})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"verify_account--footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:handleCancel,className:"footer_btn footer_btn--cancel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"btn_title",children:"H\u1EE7y"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:handleSendTokenToEmail,className:"footer_btn footer_btn--verify",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"btn_title",children:"G\u1EEDi token"})})]})]})});}
